metadata.title: CVE-2020-20896 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in function latm_write_packet inlibavformat/latmenc.c in Ffmpeg 4.2.1, allows attackers to cause a Denialof Service or other unspecified impacts due to a Null pointer dereference.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-20896` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavcodec-extra - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavcodec-extra58 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavcodec58 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavdevice58 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavfilter-extra - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavfilter-extra7 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavfilter7 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavformat-extra - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavformat-extra58 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavformat58 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavutil56 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libpostproc55 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libswresample3 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libswscale5 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1').
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
